channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Bernie Marcus, The Home Depot co-founder and billionaire philanthropist, dies at 95
item.description: Bernard “Bernie” Marcus, the co-founder of The Home Depot, the world’s largest home improvement chain, a billionaire philanthropist, and a big Republican donor, has died.

item.title: Strike at Boeing was part of a new era of labor activism long in decline at US work places
item.description: Aircraft assembly workers at Boeing factories near Seattle and elsewhere ended a seven-week strike overnight.

item.title: North Dakota measures would end local property taxes and legalize recreational marijuana
item.description: North Dakota voters are deciding ballot measures to do away with the property tax, legalize recreational marijuana and to raise the bar for citizens to amend the state constitution.
